instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Explosion in Bakırköy district of İstanbul which wounded 31 people on June 10, 2007.
output: 10ê Hezîrana 2007an de li Stenbol Bakirkoyê teqîn pêk hat û di encamê de 31 kes birîndar bûn.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Minister of Customs and Trade: Bülent Tüfenkçi
output: Wezîrê Gumrik û Bazirganiyê: Bûlent Tûfenkçi

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: “A woman abstaining from motherhood for ‘working’ actually refuses her womanhood. This is my sincere thought. A woman refusing motherhood, refusing to manage household faces the threat of losing her freedom no matter how successful she is in the business world. She is incomplete, she is lacking.
output: ‘’Jina ku ji ber karkirinê xwe ji dayikbûnê vede(bi dûr bixe) jinbûna xwe înkar dike. Ev hizra min a ji dilî ye. Jina ku qebûl neke bibe dayik, kevanîtiya mala xwe neke, li kar û barên xwe her çende biserkeftî bibe jî, ew di bin metirsîyê de ye ku azadiya xwe ji destan bide, ew nîvjin e, kêm e.’’(ÇT/MB)

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Three years have passed over the bomb attack in Reyhanlı district of Hatay. As of that day, nine other attacks against civilians were launched.
output: Bi ser dema bombeyên ku li Reyhanliyê hatibûn teqandin de 3 sal derbasbûn. Ji wê demê vir ve li dijî sivîlan 9 êrişên din hatin kirin.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: “You are maybe the last country to vote for an Armenian Genocide bill against Turkey and Turks in its parliament. Moreover, we don’t have any problem with our history on this issue anyway”.
output: 'Divê pêşî Almanya bi dîroka xwe re rû bi rû bimîne. Ey Almanya pêşî tê hisabê Holokostê bide, we li Namibyayê çawa 100 hezar însan kuşt û hûnê hisabê wê jî bidin.'

In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Operation has been launched in the area following the incident. The civilians are not being allowed in the area.
output: Piştî bûyerê operasyon hatine dest pê kirin.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Prime Minister Binali Yıldırım has spoken of the Constitutional amendment and presidential system at the Justice and Development Party (AKP) provincial directors meeting.
output: Binalî Yildirimê serokwezîr li civîna serokên bajaran yên Partiya Dad û Geşepêdanê(AKP) axivî.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Tunç had been taken into custody by civil police officers while leaving his house in Bayrampaşa on February 2. He had been brought before court on February 3, and arrested on charge of “propagandizing for the terrorist organization” in his social media postings and news photographs.
output: Hayrî Tunç 2ê Sibatê de dema ji mala xwe derdiket (Bayrampaşa-Stenbol) ji hêla polêsên sivîl ve hatibû girtin. Tunçê ku di 3ê Sibatê de sewqî dadgehê hatibû kirin, bi îdiaya ‘propagandaya rêxistinê kiriye’ hatibû girtin.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Kurtulmuş has noted that demolishing these buildings and rebuilding those would cost approximately 259,769,682 euro. (ÇT/DG)
output: Kurtûlmûşî diyar kiriye maliyeta xerakirin û ji-nû-ve-avakirina xaniyan 855 milyon [Lîreyên Tirkan] e. (ÇT/MB)

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Police barricades have been piled up surrounding Gezi Park due to the press statement planned to be held on occasion of the third year of the Gezi Resistance.
output: Ji ber ku îro salvegera Berxwedana Geziyê ye, duh êvarê polêsan derdorê parqê bi bendan dorpêç kirin.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: Bombed attack which left 15 police officers wounded in Küçükçekmece district of İstanbul on June 8, 2007.
output: 8ê Hezîrana 2007an de li Stenbol Kuçukçekmeceyê teqîna pêk hat de 15 polês birîndar bûn.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: “We will not give up journalism just because they will launch investigation”, concluded Mavioğlu.
output: Parêze Kiliç ragihand ku bi hinceta ‘propagandaya rêxistinê’ lêpirsîn hatiye vekirin.

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: TAK also warned of future attacks and called on tourists to not come to Turkey as “Turkey is no more secure” for them.
output: TAKê got: ‘Em careke din tûrîstên li Tirkiyeyê û yên dixwazin werin vir, hişyar dikin. Me kesên xerîb ji xwe re nekiriye hedef. Lêbelê ev der êdî ji bo wan ciheke ewle nîne.’

instruction: In this task, given an English sentence, the goal is to create a faithful translation of it to Kurdish language
input: President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan as to the issue had said earlier; “If a conclusion is reached in these negotiations, it’s fine. Yet if not, with all due respect, the Parliament of the Turkish Republic will not pass any decision regarding the implementation process of the Agreement”.
output: Erdogan derbarê mijarê de gotibû: ‘Eger encameke baş ji van hevdîtinan dernekeve, bila li qisûrê nenêrin. Peymana derbarê qebûlkirina penaberan de li meclisa Tirkiyeyê jî dê neyê qebûlkirin.’
